q1: Do you think Portugal has good football players?
a1: Of course, they have one of the best players in the world in Ronaldo along with Pepe, Silva, and Mario.
q2: They have a very good team.
a2: Just not good enough to progress far in the World Cup.
a3: Do you think your team is the toughest among all other team? yes,we are the great competitors among all
q4: Have they ever won the world cup?
q5: Portugal has never won the world cup?
a5: No, but they won the European Championship in 2016.
